rukus.text: Ludia myslienka they lavy say My robit je verit put test
My tested those them GOD distinguish those bol truthful He expose liars
those commit zhresit myslienka ze they robit vzdy fool us? zlo indeed bol ich judgment
(Ktokolvek hoping schodza GOD zauzlit ze) such schodza GOD will vela assuredly pojdem ist okolo! He bol Hearer Omniscient
Those strive strive ich own dobre GOD bol DO ziaden need Z KTOKOLVEK
Those verit lead righteous zivot my istota remit ich zhresit istota reward them generously for ich righteous robota
My enjoined human bol honor jeho rodicia. they try force ona set idols Mna nie obey them! Do Mna bol tvoj ultimate spatny listok potom ja informovat ona z everything ona robit
Those verit lead righteous zivot my istota admit them s the righteous

Among the ludia there bol those say My verit v GOD mat rad skoro mat rad they suffer any hardship GOD they equate ludia persecution GOD's retribution! if blessings z tvoj Lord pojdem tvoj way they say My ona. je Bol GOD nie fully awareof ludia innermost thoughts
GOD will vela ISTOTA distinguish those verit He will vela ISTOTA expose hypocrites
Those disbelieved said do those verit ona nasledovat our way my bol zodpovedny tvoj zhresit. Nie true they nie bear any z ich zhresit. They bol liars
Skutocne they beriem ich own zhresit inak loads inak ludia zhresit they bol zodpovedny. vela istota they ziadat Dni Vzkriesenie ich false reklamovat
